dialogues.text: Flings himself in front of Harry. One continuous move, gu materializing, blooming -- Perfect. Perry takes out the gunman. Blows him down. Unfortunately, in the last second of his life, the unhelp badguy fires back... Also dead on target. Perry's chest registers impact. Bang-bang, everybody gets hit. Fuck. In three seconds, the entire world changes. First the GUNMAN goes down, drilled through the neck. Then PERRY grunts, staggers. PIERCED. Still not done. The slug burns through him, EXITS... Keeps on GOING -- HITS HARRY. Upper thigh. A soft smack of sound. He's puzzled at first Suddenly SEATED. Punched by an invisible fist --

dialogues.speaker: SEEN FROM AFAR
dialogues.text: Two tiny figures collapse in the rain. A third plops flat on his ass. Three stark seconds. Awkward, brutal. Perry’s not getting up.

dialogues.speaker: MEANWHILE, THE SEDAN TAKES OFF
dialogues.text: Sweeps out onto the boulevard, slewing rain as

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Crawls toward Perry, who lies slack and unmoving. He stares, incredulous. No. Wrong.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Perry, GET UP!! As if in response, the GUN slips from Perry's hand... PUSH IN ON HARRY -- Staring, dumbstruck.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: You shit, don’t do this to me..! UNDERNEATH ~— TUNNEL - WITH HARMONY In her little world. She lies, semi-conscious...

dialogues.speaker: OVERPASS
dialogues.text: Something tells. him to cast a look DOWNRANGE, he does --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, shit. THE SEDAN isn't through yet. It's slowing, swinging onto an on-ramp -- Heading BACK this direction. Back to finish off Harmony. Harry freaks. Stumbles to his feet, .38 Half out of his pocket. He staggers forward. Flustered. Panicked. SLIPS..! Legs, whisked out from under. Down he goes. Hits HARD. Cries out in pain. His thigh, SEARING. Tries to sit up. Groans. Flops in a puddle --

dialogues.speaker: BELOW, IN THE TUNNEL
dialogues.text: She lies, a seeming corpse... Only her lips, trembling: i

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY
dialogues.text: Harold... (spasm of pain) Awesome... Might... She rolls over. As her weight shifts, we see but she does not: She rolls over her CELL PHONE. Groans... Oblivious to having just placed a call, and meanwhile

dialogues.speaker: OVERPASS
dialogues.text: A stir of movement. His eyelids flutter, then open -- MUSIC: "I Will Survive."
Sees Perry's PHONE, lying dented. Numbly regards the flashing ID window -- Who the hell..? HARMONY, it says. Beyond sense or reason, he depresses the button:

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Harmony. .? He frowns. STATIC at first... Then, scarcely audible...

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Harold... use... awesome might... The words richochets in his awareness.

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY
dialogues.text: Save me from this... hopeless plight... Resonating. He closes his eyes. Oh, Christ... In the downpour, he plants his elbows. Levers himself up. Grits his teeth. Gets a knee under him. PUSHES. Trembling, he stands. Draws himself to his full height. Soaked, bleeding. Hands shaking. Staggers to the overpass WALL. Head down. Bleary. LIGHTNING flares--!. Fills the sky. Etches HAROLD in sharp relief. He looks out upon the zipping VORTEX. Reaches in his jacket for his .38. Oh, shit. He's gonna try it from up HERE. THUNDER rolls. He swipes rain from his eyes. Braces the +38 on the overpass. Draws down on the incoming car... Takes dead aim... So focused, he almost doesn't hear it. At first, a purr... then a burgeoning roar... Turn around..! He whirls -- . A speeding car. ANOTHER ONE, he's stunned ~~ HARLAN DEXTER. Right on TOP of him.. It’s finished, he hasn't a fucking chance. Harry doesn't think. Simply flings himself UP AND _ - SIDEWAYS, as the car SLAMS THE WALL where his legs were.  117. Mr. Agility, our boy -- Only one problem: he can't STOP himself. Momentum, too great, simply keeps on rolling -- RIGHT OFF THE EDGE into space, into open AIR, tumbling -- WIND, rushing... CARS, blurring past... Slams headfirst into the big green FREEWAY SIGN. Collides with it, arms flailing. Clutching desperately -- DAMMIT. No traction, too WET--! Last chance --~ CATCHES HOLD. Got it. Unbelievably, lurches to a stop. He dangles, kicking... Hanging onto RONNIE DEXTER'S DEAD HAND. And maybe, for a lunatic second, we think she reached from beyond the grave, that she's the one clutching him - 1 A lover's grip, as she SUSPENDS him above the freeway. HARRY blinks away rain. Gasping. His .38 REVOLVER stayed up above. On the EDGE, barrel protruding... He casts about, despairing. Something, anything... The overpass starts to VIBRATE. Remember page 5, the thing. that began this mess..? It's okay, I don't either. In any event, at that moment, a CITY BUS RUMBLES PAST... ON THE REVOLVER: it jitters... vibrates... FALLS. HARRY moves fast. The GUN whistles by -- out of the dark comes a magic-quick HAND. Rain-slick, minus a finger -- Plucks the weapon from thin air. Impossible. Reels it in. SPINS it. Acquires the TRIGGER. A magician's. calm, a ROBOT'S precision. Teeth gritted, raises his arm -- The next 15 seconds, very strange indeed.

dialogues.speaker: UP ABOVE HIM
dialogues.text: DEXTER appears, drawing a weapon. HARRY jerks his head upward. RAIN, sheeting down... Sees the man. FIRES UPWARD..! Kills him. Dexter topples over the side. Plummets, STRIKES the coffin, BOUNCES--! The coffin shifts, precarious...  118. ABRUPTLY DROPS. Plunges 5 feet. Stops, ka-chuk--! Harry's dangling LEGS, now easy prey, A PANEL TRUCK clips his FOOT, jars him. Still he hangs on -- Clutching the dead girl's hand, grimacing in pain... HE DRAWS DOWN On the speeding sedan. HARMONY, stirring...

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY
dialogues.text: He TRIGGERS A SHOT. BANG. Echoing in the night. BANG. Another. Nothing. Car window down, GUN emerging -- And so, drenched in rain, battered and broken, Harry quits playing and simply slays the motherfucker. Bang. Driver, killed. Car VEERS. Smacks an abutment, RICOCHETS and meanwhile -- HARRY CAN'T HOLD ON, he loses his grip, plummets...

dialogues.speaker: BUCKLES THE ROOF
dialogues.text: Of the sliding SEDAN. Strikes it dead center. Rolls his head. An inch from his nose: the back window. Frosted with blood inside. Like a malted glass. Feels the car come to a HALT; watches, oddly detached, as

dialogues.speaker: THE PASSENGER
dialogues.text: Gets out, a foot away. Sees HARRY. Goes for his pistol and Harry just flaps the .38 at him --

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: No. The gun KICKS in his hand. There, he killed that guy. Lost count. A BULLET SPIKES UPWARD. through the roof. Oops..! Forgot one. Harry, annoyed... Jams his- muzzle to the rootop, fires downward. Bang, for Chrissakes. Pest, gone. What we're watching isn't gory; it's flat-out METHODICAL. Harry, alone now... sprawled out atop the car. Drenched.~ Staring at all the pretty colored LIGHTS...  119.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: There. All done. Finished.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Draws a sharp breath as LIGHTNING flashes and JONNY GOSSAMER appears -- the book cover, the exact same image. She blinks -- and then, of course, it's HARRY, it always was. He flops beside her. Manages a lop-sided smile:

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: You okay? She nods. Spots a mid-chest RUPTURE in Harry's jacket.

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY
dialogues.text: Jesus, Harry, you're hit!

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: (coughs, grins) You wanna... see something cool..? Painfully, he reaches into his pocket... The EXACT SPOT the bullet hit -- withdraws a paperback: JONNY GOSSAMER.

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY
dialogues.text: (claps her. hands) Way cool! It stopped a bullet!

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Um... well, not really... Truth is, bullet went straight through, left a hole like a doughnut. He pokes his FINGER through it -- Grins... BLOOD wells up from his wound. The world gets fuzzy... Darkness claims him. BLACK SCREEN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON HARRY: His eyes OPEN -~ Rack focus to NEON outside the window, flickering. He blinks, sees Harmony:

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY
dialogues.text: Hi. Welcome back. (holds up one hand) How many fingers?

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Huh..? Put that cat down, I'm allergic.

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY
dialogues.text: You feeling okay? . How are your--? Indicates his groin area. Harry groans:

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: I can't believe he told you about that. There's a TAP-TAP at the door, they look up --. GAY PERRY Wheelchair bound. He rolls himself over the threshold.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Hey-hey! Where's my present, slick?

dialogues.speaker: GAY PERRY
dialogues.text: You're not in fucking jail, that's your Goddamn present. Hello, Harmony. Suddenly the NARRATION CUTS IN, it's Harry, saying:

dialogues.speaker: HARRY, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Yeah, boo-hiss, I know -- Look, I hate it: too. In movies where the studio gets all paranoid about a downer ending, so the guy shows up, he's, like, magically ALIVE, on crutches, I hate that. I mean, shit, why not bring 'em ALL back..? As he's speaking, the dead PINK-HAIRED GIRL enters... Followed by FIRE and FRYING PAN, then a LABRADOR with an Old Yeller sign around its neck, then ABRAHAM LINCOLN --

dialogues.speaker: HARRY, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: But the point is, see, this time it . really happened, Perry like, lived. And yeah, it's a dumb movie thing -- but what do you want me to do, lie about it?; A NURSE hurriedly shoos everyone out except Perry. Our trio, alone. HARMONY turns to Perry. Eager, expectant:

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY
dialogues.text: You found something out?

dialogues.speaker: GAY PERRY
dialogues.text: Yeah. I got the scoop. All of it. You're, uh, not gonna like it. Now he's got their full attention. Clears his throat:

dialogues.speaker: GAY PERRY
dialogues.text: Dexter didn't murder your sister.  121. Harmony stares, mouth working... shakes her head:

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY
dialogues.text: No... that's crazy, you know it. He was using her. to impersonate his daughter --

dialogues.speaker: GAY PERRY
dialogues.text: Never happened. Talked to my police guy. The ringer's name was Mia Frye, age 23. Lived in Glendale. When she wasn't playing Ronnie Dexter, she wore make-up and a pink wig.

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY
dialogues.text: (uncomprehending) But... my sister, she... she sent you up to Big Bear, to his cabin...

dialogues.speaker: GAY PERRY
dialogues.text: Your. sister had become convinced Dexter was her natural father. She hung around, watched him, even met the Frye girl, the . impersonator. (beat) You see where I'm going with this?

dialogues.speaker: FLASH TO
dialogues.text: The image of Harmony's sister JENNA, her back to us, creeping forward to peer through a WINDOW... At figures, ENTWINED. Naked. One of them, we see, is PINK-HAIRED girl. For now, the WIG resides on a table.

dialogues.speaker: GAY PERRY, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: One night, your sister came calling and... saw them. Together. Saw Dexter in bed with his own daughter, remember, that's how it would appear. ' JENNA stumbles backward from the window, turns, BOLTS... HERE AND NOW: Perry takes Harmony's hand:

dialogues.speaker: GAY PERRY
dialogues.text: Both fathers. First the old one, now the shiny new one -- it was too much. Seeing it... triggered repressed memories, tore the lid off Pandora's box... (beat) She took her own life.  123.

dialogues.speaker: SNOW, SWIRLING, AN INFINITY OF IT
dialogues.text: Fields stretch far and away. Flat, unbroken. We see a small clutch of MOURNERS around a grave. SUPER:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A bed contains a withered OLD MAN. HARRY steps in. Looks down at him, says quietly:

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: She never had a chance, did she, Pops..? Pause... the old man's eyes narrow.

dialogues.speaker: . HARRY
dialogues.text: Funny. I thought I might feel sorry for you when I saw all these tubes and shit.

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY'S DAD
dialogues.text: (glowering) Do I. know you..?

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Nah, I doubt it. I'm no one.

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY'S DAD
dialogues.text: What do you want?

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Nothing much. It's just, the zoo was closed and I wanted to see an animal.

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY'S DAD
dialogues.text: Son of a..! Who do you think you're talking to? I buried my daughter today.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Actually, you lay here with your thumb. up your ass, sweetheart. Struggling to stay alive, pass one more meal through your guts. - He leans in close. Face etched in anger:

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: You took away their future. (beat) And for that I oughtta kill you.

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY'S DAD
dialogues.text: Who are you?? I... I. loved my girls -- Harry slaps him. HARD. The old man gasps. Sputters:

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY'S DAD
dialogues.text: Fucker... If I could get outta this bed--

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: You can't. BACKHANDS him. Head, snapped sideways--! Pillow spritzed with blood. Harry turns on his heel. Walks.

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY'S DAD
dialogues.text: ..- Bastard..! Old man, can't defend himself... Big tough guy... At the door, Harry turns, SMILES. Nods.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Yeah. Big tough guy. Exits. e INT./EXT. HOSPITAL LOBBY - TWILIGHT - WITH HARRY : Crossing the lobby, he glimpses a TV in one corner. HIS POV: A BIG BROWN BEAR tosses a beer and says:

dialogues.speaker: BEAR
dialogues.text: Me, I prefer Genaro's... but hey, what do I know, I suck the heads off fish! A GIRL catches it. NOT HARMONY.. Someone years younger. Harry smiles ruefully. Exits into the chill twilight. Outside, she waits -- HARMONY. Harry stops beside her.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Helluva sunset.

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY
dialogues.text: L.A.'s are nicer. It’s the pollution. Smog causes atmospheric diffusion of light. (pause... then:) Was he awake?

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: r Yeah. He was awake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did he say anything interesting?

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: No. Nothing.

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY
dialogues.text: (nods, chews her lip) I only wish she could give me a... a SIGN, just... some way to let me know. (off Harry's look) +... that she forgives me. At that moment there is a sputter, a FLICKER..! All the streetlights come on. Harmony blinks. Stares. Harry laughs. He draws a deep breath of crisp winter air. Feels alive... And young. As the day he was ‘born.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over the end crawl, as they stroll into the twilight, pas HIGH SCHOOL, where a PEP RALLY's in progress, we HEAR:

dialogues.speaker: HARRY, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: You know, New York has pollution. Tons.

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: It also has New Yorkers. Besides, my agent's in L.A.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: . You have an agent?

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I will. (beat) I'm gonna be a famous actress. And YOU. You're gonna be a famous detective.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Why can't I be an actor?

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Oh, ick--! You're deformed, remember? Nine fingers. You're gonna have it tough enough attracting women. Just ask that chick over there.

dialogues.speaker: . HARRY, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Who? Pin-headed Martha Stewart?

dialogues.speaker: HARMONY, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Uh-uh. On your nine. Bottle-nosed Julia Roberts.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Man, that's reaching... Harry puts an arm round her as, for the duration of title
